title: Chapter 3: Nav2 Path Planning for Humanoid Robots
description: This chapter focuses on adapting the Navigation2 (Nav2) stack for humanoid robots. Unlike wheeled robots, humanoid robots have unique constraints related to bipedal locomotion, balance, and step planning that require specialized path planning approaches.

frontMatter.title: Chapter 3: Nav2 Path Planning for Humanoid Robots
